attributes.action: pass a new law protecting free speech and freedom of assembly
attributes.additional_details: Because these freedoms are being violated by unelected international organisations not answerable to the British electorate
attributes.background: protect our freedom of speech and freedom of assembly

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about restrictions on freedom of speech and freedom to assemble, but we're not sure exactly what new protections you want the Government to introduce, or existing restrictions you want to be removed.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
